DOC.brief_title: The Exploration Pharmacodynamics Pharmacokinetics YH4808 New Formulation Healthy Subjects
DOC.criteria: 1. healthy adult age 20 55 55kg ideal body weight ( BMI ) 18.5 ~ 25 2 . Subject congenital , chronic disease disease symptoms medical examination result 3. negative Helicobacter pylorus 13C urea breath test 4 . Subject judge eligible accord various test result include laboratory test ( serum test , hematologic/blood chemistry examination , urine test , etc . ) 12lead ECG test perform within 4 week first IP administration . 5 . Subject agree maintain contraception comply medically verified contraception method ( include infertility ) 1 . Subject history presence clinically significant disease liver , kidney , nervous system , respiratory system , endocrine system , blood tumor , cardiovascular , reproductive , musculoskeletal system , mental disorder , ophthalmologic disease , skin disease investigator 's judgement . 2 . Subject history surgical operation disease relate gastrointestinal symptom ( e.g . crohn 's diseas , ulcer , etc . except appendectomy simple hernia ) could influence absorption IP . 3 . Subject hypersensitive component contain YH4808 drug ( aspirin , antibiotic , etc . ) 4. pregnant lactate woman . 5 . Other exclusion apply .
